alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sublette and west central Fremont Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cora, or 10 miles northwest of Pinedale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Willow Lake around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include New Fork Lake, Fremont Lake and Squaretop Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
